description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4qig2","text":"Purpose: To dissociate human adipose to obtain adipose progenitors and endothelial cells for cell culture experiments. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"53a71","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9qqfn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4dret","text":"Adapted from Miltenyi Biotec - Adipose Tissue Dissociation Kit (attached). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78h92","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"66udh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"file","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"forceSelection":true,"guid":"","id":410873,"original_name":"Human Adipose Dissociation and Cell Culture (2).pdf","placeholder":"","raw_source":"","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nth3b8u6f.pdf"}},"1":{"type":"file","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"forceSelection":true,"guid":"","id":410872,"original_name":"Miltenyi Adipose dissociation protocol.pdf","placeholder":"","raw_source":"","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nth2b8u6f.pdf"}}}}

groups.title: Cellular Senescence Network (SenNet) Method Development Community

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8rnos","text":"Adipose Tissue Dissociation Kit mouse and rat (Miltenyi Biotec; 130-105-808)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":76}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"57o4h","text":"Kit Components: 5 vials containing:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"oktm","text":"2 vials of Enzyme D (lyophilized powder)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8r2gq","text":"1 vial of Enzyme R (lyophilized powder)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"665nk","text":"1 vial of Enzyme A (lyophilized powder)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ejcvn","text":"1 mL of Buffer A","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"38h0h","text":"Fibroblast Media (made ahead of time)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":37}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"t92j","text":"500mL MEMα (Gibco; 32561037)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eodha","text":"10µL EGF 500 µL/mL (R\u0026D Systems; 263-EG-200 = recon in 400 µL PBS, aliquot and store at -80C )","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f4kue","text":"2.5 µL FGFbasic 50 µg/mL (R\u0026D Systems; 233-FB-025 = recon in 500 µL PBS, aliquot and store at -80C)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hltg","text":"50 mL FBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5blrv","text":"5 mL MEM Non-essential amino acids (NEAA) (Gibco;11140050)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ufug","text":"5 mL Pen/Strep (Gibco;15140122)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3msba","text":"Prepare Enzyme D by reconstitution of the lyophilized powder in each vial with 3 mL of DMEM and sterile filter. Prepare 0.5 mL aliquots to avoid repeated freeze-thaw-cycles. Store aliquots at –20 °C. This solution is stable for 6 months after reconstitution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9afgv","text":"Prepare Enzyme R by reconstitution of the lyophilized powder in the vial with 2.7 mL of DMEM. Prepare 250 µL aliquots to avoid repeated freeze-thaw-cycles. Store aliquots at –20 °C. This solution is stable for 6 months after reconstitution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4m9an","text":"Prepare Enzyme A by reconstitution of the lyophilized powder in the vial with 1 mL of Buffer A supplied with the kit. Do not vortex. Prepare 50 µL aliquots to avoid repeated freeze-thaw-cycles. Store aliquots at –20 °C. This solution is stable for 6 months after reconstitution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"38hr6","text":"Prepare Enzyme Mix with prepared enzymes from step 1. 2-4 samples are typically processed at a","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8jppj","text":"time and enzyme mix should be prepared as master mix for all the samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2tu2t","text":"Enzyme Mix:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"47u69","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"88jsk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4q60l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_5":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_5":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["Component","(1X)","X"],"colWidths":[100,100,100],"data":[["DMEM","2.35 mL",""],["Enzyme D ","100 µL",""],["Enzyme R ","50 µL",""],["Enzyme A ","12.5 µL",""],["Total","2.5 mL",""]],"guid":"EE278C03C6134F26A60A83BD9CCEA685","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["DMEM","2.35 mL",""],["Enzyme D ","100 µL",""],["Enzyme R ","50 µL",""],["Enzyme A ","12.5 µL",""],["Total","2.5 mL",""]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7444r","text":"Aliquot 2.5 mL of Enzyme mix into gentleMACS C Tube for each sample and label tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eqqo1","text":"Transfer 0.5g of adipose tissue into the gentleMACS C Tube containing the enzyme mix. Use a small sterile scissors to cut tissue into small pieces while in the C Tube. Tightly close tube beyond the first resistance.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5tdag","text":"Use the heating function of the gentleMACS Octo Dissociator with Heaters run program 37C_mr_ATDK_1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":32,"length":40},{"style":"bold","offset":85,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bghg2","text":"After termination of the program, detach C Tube from the gentleMACS Dissociator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8i8o4","text":"(Optional) Perform a short centrifugation step up to 300×g to collect the sample material at the tube bottom and resuspend cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9esgj","text":"Label a 15 mL tube for each sample. Place a MACS SmartStrainer (100 µm) on each 15 mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"953cc","text":"Pour the cell suspension through the MACS SmartStrainer (100 µm) into the labeled 15 mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8h6ds","text":"Rinse the C tube and wash the MACS SmartStrainer with 5–10 mL of DMEM for each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2caqs","text":"Discard the MACS SmartStrainer and centrifuge cell suspension at 300×g for 10 minutes. Aspirate supernatant completely.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"587tt","text":"Gently resuspend cell pellet with 1 mL ACK Lysis Solution (Gibco A10492-01) to lyse red blood cells. Incubate samples at room temperature for 3 minutes and add 3 mL DMEM to each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a6kss","text":"Centrifuge cell suspension at 300×g for 10 minutes. Aspirate supernatant leaving ~0.5mL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b2fns","text":"Resuspend cell pellet and transfer to labeled 10cm plate with 10 mL Fibroblast media for each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":68,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"efds0","text":"Place 10 cm plates in 37C/5% CO2 incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"833ei","text":"Change media on the cells after 18-24 hours and change the media every 3-4 days until confluent using Fibroblast media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a4tuh","text":"Harvest cells by removing media and adding 2 mL TrypLE to 10 cm plate. Incubate at room temperature until cells begin to detach.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bicol","text":"Resuspend cells and transfer to 15 mL tube with 2 mL Fibroblast media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3bn7a","text":"Centrifuge cells at 1500 rpm for 3 minutes. Remove supernate and resuspend cells in residual volume.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"92q1f","text":"Transfer 1/10 of cells to new 10 cm plate with 10 mL Fibroblast media to continue to growing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5qfvh","text":"Freeze down the remainder of the cells in fibroblast freezing media (50% FBS/40% Fibroblast media/10% DMSO) in 1 mL aliquots (2-3 aliquots/10cm plate)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
